sqlMap.select: SELECT NTT_SEQ , NTT_SJ , NTT_CN , FRST_REGISTER_ID FROM T_NTTINFO WHERE 1=1 AND NTT_SEQ = #ntt_seq# ORDER BY NTT_SEQ DESC
